page.title: 06Sandwell Valley West Brom
page.content: In the Sandwell Valley ,as you cross over the M5 Motorway ,you approach swan pool. Here you can get involved with sailing and windsurfing activities. It is here that you find the home of the Sandwell Valley Sailing Club . Swan Pool is only used by crafts which are not powered by a motor . The area surrounding the pool is used as part of the nature trail, having picnic area and way marked paths. Part of the land belongs to Forge Farm,which concentrates on the production of crops and sileage.The other farm to be found in the Valley is Old Forge Mill Farm,which is now being converted into a residential farm centre,whereby groups of chilren can stay short periods to study the local environment and to be involved in the day to day running of a farm.
